Html:
Hello, I am facinated by this project and tried the last 3 days to implement a map in my project.

Unfortunately the best result I got was a single tile of a map which was slided to the upper left corner and every time I drag the tile back to the middle it plops back to the upper left corner if it come to close to the lower left corner.

I am totally helpless with this, maybe someone also had this problem (and a solution for this)???

I'm using VB.NET (VS 2010), Framework 4, x86 and he following code, maybe I missed something??

    Private Sub Start()
        MainMap.Dock = DockStyle.Fill
        MainMap.Position = New PointLatLng(54, 25)
        MainMap.MapProvider = GMapProviders.BingMap
        MainMap.Manager.Mode = AccessMode.ServerOnly
        MainMap.MinZoom = 2
        MainMap.MaxZoom = 15
        MainMap.Zoom = 10
    End Sub
this issue is fixed in the latest version in source

This problem is still present in version 87ad3f0d78b3, which latest version do you mean?

Btw, thanks a lot for all your great work :-)
i have form with docked map control, no manual resize is needed
